menu_navigation.content: Go to Theme Settings > Header to set the navigation for the Menu drawer.

header_navigation.content: Go to Theme Settings > Header to set the navigation for the Header.

article_table_of_contents.content: Metafields can be used to show a table of contents. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/286-space-templates-article).

cart_content.content: Blocks can be used to show featured content within the cart drawer. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/278-core-sections-cart-drawer).

cart_empty.content: Show additonal content when the cart is empty. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/278-core-sections-cart-drawer).

cart_progress_bar.content: Show a visual indication when customers receive a discount. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/278-core-sections-cart-drawer).

cart_upsell_checkbox.content: Add a checkbox to let customers easily opt-in to upgrade their order. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/278-core-sections-cart-drawer).

cart_upsell_featured.content: Blocks can be used to show featured upsells within the cart drawer. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/278-core-sections-cart-drawer).

collection_blocks.content: Blocks can be used to show additional promotional content within a collection grid. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/273-core-templates-collection).

dropdown_blocks.content: Blocks can be used to show featured content within the desktop dropdown navigation. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/280-core-sections-header).

dropdown_usage.content: The dropdown menu appears when the layout is set to 'Left' and the menu has sub-links.

menu_content.content: Blocks can be used to show featured content within the menu drawer. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/279-core-sections-menu-drawer).

menu_images.content: Blocks can be used to show featured images within the menu drawer. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/279-core-sections-menu-drawer).

menu_products.content: Blocks can be used to show products within the menu drawer. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/279-core-sections-menu-drawer).

overlap_warning.content: Note: The back to top bottom may overlap with fixed elements. Consider disabling the sticky add to cart bar to avoid this.

product_bundle.content: Use metafields to assign products to this bundle. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/274-core-templates-product)

product_linking.content: Link multiple products together and display them as options. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/274-core-templates-product)

row_size.content: Row size sets the maxium number of items that can be displayed in a single row.

enable_fade.label: Enable fade
enable_fade.info: Use a gradient to fade items as they move. Only works while using a 'Custom' color scheme.

auto_scroll_delay.info: Set this to 0 to disable automatic scrolling.
auto_scroll_delay.label: Auto scroll delay

cart_button_behavior.info: Main action button in your cart drawer.
cart_button_behavior.label: Action button

checkbox_upsell_id.info: The upsell checkbox can only be used with single variants.
checkbox_upsell_id.label: Variand ID

col_span.info: Extend the width of a block by forcing it to take up multiple columns.
col_span.label: Column span

color_custom.label: Custom background
color_custom.info: Select the 'Custom' scheme to use any color.

countdown_date.info: Enter a date in the following format: mm/dd/yyyy.
countdown_date.label: Countdown date

dropdown_menu.info: When 'Desktop layout' is set to 'Center' navigation will open the 'Menu drawer' section.
dropdown_menu.label: Menu

enable_color_fade.info: Background colors will gradually change as you scroll between sections. This only applies to sections where this setting is enabled.
enable_color_fade.label: Enable color fade

enable_default_plans.info: Select first available selling plan by default.
enable_default_plans.label: Enable default selling plan

enable_default_selling_plan_widget.info: Use the built-in selling plan widget.
enable_default_selling_plan_widget.label: Enable default selling plan widget

enable_default_variant.info: First variant will be selected by default.
enable_default_variant.label: Enable default variant

enable_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout).
enable_dynamic_checkout.label: Enable dynamic checkout

enable_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)
enable_gift_card_recipient.label: Enable recipient form for gift card products

enable_header_overlap.info: Banner content will be shown under the top header bar. Use a transparent header to make the banner content visible.
enable_header_overlap.label: Enable header overlap

enable_zoom.info: Clicking an image will show a full-screen view.
enable_zoom.label: Enable zoom

image_map.info: This image will be used instead of the map if you disable dynamic map.
image_map.label: Image

intent.info: Note: Complementary results need to be set up using the Search and discovery [app](/admin/apps/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations). Related products are automatically generated.
intent.label: Gallery position

inventory_threshold.info: Inventory count will be displayed if stock falls below this number.
inventory_threshold.label: Inventory threshold

link_as_button.info: If a navigation item contains a dropdown the top level link can be clicked to open the dropdown instead of acting as a link.
link_as_button.label: Use top-level links as buttons

linked_menu.info: Specify which menu link you want this block to be displayed with.
linked_menu.label: Menu

linked_option.info: An optional field to specify which variant option to display this next to. E.g. set to 'size' to display this next to the size option.
linked_option.label: Option

logo_overlay.info: Used when a banner has the overlay setting enabled.
logo_overlay.label: Overlay logo

overlay_color_border.info: Border applied when using a banner that has the overlay setting enabled.
overlay_color_border.label: Overlay border

overlay_color_scheme.info: Color scheme applied when using a banner that has the overlay setting enabled.
overlay_color_scheme.label: Overlay color scheme

progress_bar_calculation.info: Choose to calculate the progress bar based on subtotal or total.
progress_bar_calculation.label: Progress bar calculation

progress_bar_success.info: This message will be shown when the minimum threshold is reached.
progress_bar_success.label: Success message

progress_bar_threshold.info: Enter the value without a currency symbol and use a decimal to separate dollars and cents. E.g. 10.00
progress_bar_threshold.label: Minimum amount

row_span.info: Extend the height of a block by forcing it to take up multiple rows.
row_span.label: Row span

search_recommendations.info: Show recommended links as customers search.
search_recommendations.label: Search recommendations

show_alt.info: Alt text will be displayed under each image.
show_alt.label: Show alt text

show_blog_image.info: Featured article image will be used.
show_blog_image.label: Show featured image

show_cart_subtotals.info: By default cart subtotals are only shown when the cart has an active discount. Enable this setting to always show the cart summary.
show_cart_subtotals.label: Show cart subtotals

show_collection_image.info: Featured collection image will be used.
show_collection_image.label: Show featured image

show_tagline.info: Show a short description for a product. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/262-sitewide-adding-taglines-to-product-thumbnails).
show_tagline.label: Show product tagline

show_variant_images.info: Images will be hidden based on which variants are selected. Additional setup is required. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/274-core-templates-product).
show_variant_images.label: Show selected variant images only

tab.info: Specify which tab this block belongs to.
tab.label: Tab

tabs.info: A comma-seperated list of tab titles.
tabs.label: Tabs

table_headings.info: A comma-seperated list of table headings. Note: Using more than 3 headings may cause the layout to break.
table_headings.label: Table headings

url.info: Set a URL to make the entire block clickable. Using this while adding links inside the content field can break the section. All buttons within this block will point to this URL.
url.label: URL

use_ratio.info: Gallery images will be resized to set aspect ratio.
use_ratio.label: Use set aspect ratio

icon_text.label: Using 'Center' or 'Right' alignment will force items to stack vertically.

enable_audio.info: Audio is applied to interactions to reinforce specific functionality.
enable_audio.label: Enable audio interface sounds

read_our_guide.content: Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/208-setup-border-settings) for help selecting your border settings.

cart_behavior.info: Control the site behavior when items are added to a customers cart.
cart_behavior.label: Add to cart behavior

cart_icon_behavior.info: Control the behavior of the cart button in the header.
cart_icon_behavior.label: Cart button behavior

color_bar.info: This setting controls the top bar on mobile devices. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/209-setup-color-settings).
color_bar.label: Mobile bar

color_foreground_body_dark.info: Text color to use on a dark backgrounds.
color_foreground_body_dark.label: Alternative text

read_our_guide.content: Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/209-setup-color-settings) for help setting up your color palette.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px. 400 x 400px recommended.
favicon.label: Favicon image

favicon_text.content: Favicon may also be shown in search results and rich snippets. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/structured-data/logo).

header_links_desktop.info: This menu will be displayed in the dropdown desktop menu or the Menu drawer.
header_links_desktop.label: Main menu

header_links_mobile.info: This menu will be displayed in the Menu drawer. If left blank the 'Desktop menu' will be used inside the Menu drawer.
header_links_mobile.label: Drawer menu

header_links_submenu.info: This menu will be displayed at the bottom of the Menu drawer.
header_links_submenu.label: Submenu

header_overlap_desktop.info: Set the amount to overlap content behind your header when using overlap on desktop.
header_overlap_desktop.label: Desktop header overlap

header_overlap_mobile.info: Set the amount to overlap content behind your header when using overlap on mobile.
header_overlap_mobile.label: Mobile header overlap

header_blend.label: Enable color blend
header_blend.info: Works best when content uses a light color.

enable_language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).
enable_language.label: Enable language selector

enable_region.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments).
enable_region.label: Enable country/region selector

gap_size.info: All grid elements will use spacing set by the grid margin.
gap_size.label: Grid margin

animate_header.info: An optional animation that transitions the header bar into view.
animate_header.label: Header animation

enable_animated_images.info: Images will fade using the dominant color from the center.
enable_animated_images.label: Enable animated images

enable_animations.info: Animations are used to enhance the user experience and make the site more interactive.
enable_animations.label: Enable animations

enable_currency.info: Uncheck this to hide the currency code in prices.
enable_currency.label: Show currency symbol

enable_zeros.info: Uncheck this to hide '.00' in prices.
enable_zeros.label: Show trailing zeros

enable_collection_url.info: Product page URLs will include the collection handle they were linked from.
enable_collection_url.label: Enable collection aware product URLs

unavailable_indication.info: Control how unavailable options are indicated.
unavailable_indication.label: Unavailable indication

options__2.label: When option is not available in any variant

options__3.label: When option is not available with selections

product_card_enable_tagline.info: Show a short description for a product. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/262-sitewide-adding-taglines-to-product-thumbnails).
product_card_enable_tagline.label: Enable product tagline

product_card_stock_threshold.info: Remaining stock count of a product will be displayed if it falls below this number. Leave this blank to hide the stock count.
product_card_stock_threshold.label: Stock threshold

quick_search_text.content: Set which fields are queired with quick-search. Note: Using all fields can be slow.

search_page_text.content: Control what results are shown when searching.

enable_local_business.info: Display your website in local search results. Great for businesses with one physical store. To change your store address, visit [general settings](/admin/settings/general). [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/structured-data/local-business#examples).
enable_local_business.label: Enable local business

maps_api_key.info: You'll need to register a Google Maps API Key to display any map. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/148-creating-a-google-maps-api-key).
maps_api_key.label: Google Maps API key

read_our_guide.content: Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/210-setup-typography-settings) for help selecting your border settings.

type_base_size.info: All page elements will scale based on the base font size.
type_base_size.label: Base font size

type_scale_ratio.info: Set the rate font sizes are changed. E.g. setting this to 200 will double the font size for each heading level.
type_scale_ratio.label: Scale ratio

type_seperator.info: The text separator is used to add separation between text elements within certain buttons.
type_seperator.label: Text separator
